function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, compromised health and well-being of occupants.","Mitigation":"Use of advanced HVAC systems, regular maintenance of ventilation systems, and implementation of air purification technologies.","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation monitoring systems.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially those in close proximity to each other.","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, and maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission, compromised health and safety of occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict sanitation protocols, regular cleaning and disinfection, and provision of adequate hygiene facilities.","Technologies":"Sanitation monitoring systems, touchless fixtures, UV-C disinfection technology.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially those using shared facilities and common areas.","Owner":"Building management, cleaning staff, and occupants."},{"Description":"Overcrowding and insufficient space leading to the potential for rapid disease transmission within buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease outbreaks, compromised physical distancing, and heightened stress among occupants.","Mitigation":"Limiting building occupancy, reconfiguring spaces for social distancing, and implementing remote work policies.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, space utilization software, telecommuting technologies.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially in densely populated areas and shared spaces.","Owner":"Building management, human resources department, and facility planners."}]}
